predict_emulator module¶

predict_emulator.compute_analytic_wp(omega_m, omega_b, H0, ns, w0, sigma_8, redshift, ngal, siglogM, M1_over_Mmin, M0_over_M1, alpha, f_cen, wp_binmin=None, wp_binmax=None)[source]¶
